root.name: Rise of Immortals
root.description: Set in the Graxia universe Rise of Immortals immerses the player in 1v1 through to 5v5 PvP scenarios aswell as PvE modes aswell.PC System RequirementsMinimumRecommendedOS: Windows XP / VistaCPU: Intel Pentium 4 3000 MHz / AMD Athlon 64 3000+RAM: 2 GBHDD: 2 GB FreeGraphics Card: GeForce 7600 / ATI Radeon Ð¥1600OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo 3000 MHz / AMD Athlon 64 6400+ or betterRAM: 4 GB or moreHDD: 4 GB or moreGraphics Card: GeForce 8800 / ATI Radeon HD 4700 or better
